column4: hey guys, i have 7.10 installed on a desktop..i've been using wired ethernet but now just installed my wireless card...how do i install this??
first check if the card is detected
i dont think it is, how do i do this?
from terminal, "dmesg"
do you see your card mentioned?
dont recongize anything
from terminal, run "lspci"
okay, i see stuff about display and ide..and usb and pci
nothing that looks like your wifi card?
i had a friend install the card but i dont remember the make of the card
i see things about bluetooth
find out what card is installed. Are you running ubuntu 7.10?
ya
system > administration > network   do you see your card?
no
I'd check if the card is properly installed: open your box, check, and while you're at it, write down any info you see on the card
i just installed it, i was running windows xp so i know the card was properly installed and working
so, you've got a dual boot, then? Find out through Windows what card it is
im only running ubuntu, but i know the card is alright
thanks bro
good luck!
